sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Set "change.conflict.consolidated_conflicts" system property to true for Zboot instances.  Consolidate conflicts so a conflict is only registered for each unique combination of conflict type and schedule or conflicting-change.  This will result in less conflicts but the Maintenance/Blackout schedules and conflicting changes will each be denoted as a conflict, if the property is set to false the original Change Conflict behaviour will continue.</description> <name>Consolidate CHG conflicts default zboot</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[(function () { if (pm.isZboot()) gs.setProperty("change.conflict.consolidated_conflicts", true); })();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-03-10 14:50:28</sys_created_on> <sys_id>41530a94736300102eb52d2b04f6a7ef</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Consolidate CHG conflicts default zboot</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Change Management - Collision Detector" source="com.snc.change.collision">479385476da620100acb70b3534330f0</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_41530a94736300102eb52d2b04f6a7ef</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-03-12 14:58:17</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
